Services

Welshimer Wheels Price List

Welshimer Wheels Labor Price List

  • Basic tune-up — $50 (includes safety check, cleaning, adjusting derailleurs, brakes, check all bolts for proper torque, test ride)
  • Major tune up — $70 (includes basic tune up plus truing wheels)
  • Truing wheels — $15 per wheel/$25 a pair
  • Assemble bicycle — $60-$90 (out of box depending on amount pre-assembled)
  • Complete overhaul — $150
  • Parts
    • — Tubes - $6
    • — puncture resistant tube - $12
    • — slime (4 oz.) - $4
    • — contact us for other price quotes
  • Tire or tube installation - $5, slime install - $4
  • Wheel build - $45 plus parts

We do not service trikes or electric bikes
